                          java.lang.String picture,
                          double progress,
                          int max)
        Creates panel to display badge data
        Parameters:
        description - String of the badge description
        title - String of the badge title
        picture - String of the location of picture to display
        progress - double value of percentage completion of badge
        Max - int value of the progress bar max (100)
